root.name: MISSING: The 13th Victim
root.description: Plot Missing: The 13th Victim is an expansion which picks up the story one year after the Jack Lorski and Karen Gijman cases. The serial killer, the Phoenix, has returned with a fresh new CD-Rom filled with images and clues to a new sinister plot. Can the player analyze the clues and decipher the puzzles in time or will the Phoenix claim another victim? System requirementsWindows:333 MHz Intel Pentium II or AMD Equivalent CPU128 MB RAM16x CD/DVD-ROM drive700 MB hard disk spaceDirectX compatible graphics cardDirectX compatible sound card

similar_games.game: Crime Stories: From the Files of Martin Mystère
